Portal 2 is one of those games that I come back to every once in a while to remind me of how beautiful story writing can be without the need of shooting someone else, or having dramatic and complex villains. Simply being moved by the sequence that plays out during this game, with its background to elaborate on its story, is more than enough to bring us into the world of Portal, and God what a beautiful world it is. I'm proud to call this my favorite game along with many others, as well as a masterpiece. Get it if you haven't. You won't regret it.

Oh yeah, the cake's a lie too. (Portal reference)

I love this game a lot! I like the Singleplayer Campaign! I love the Co-op Campaign! I love making levels. I love the music! I love everything about it! I can't stop playing until I decide to! Why are there so many exclaimation points?! Jesus Christ! Oh, my God! Help me! Someone!

Dispensa comentarios

One of the greatest games I’ve ever played. The community test chambers alone are worth it, and with how little this game costs nowadays, this is an experience you cannot miss out on. Great puzzles, diversity of environments and objects to interact with, amazing performances by the voice actors (especially J. K. Simmons), good storytelling and jokes, amazing and dazzling soundtrack, and overall large amount of sheer kinetic energy, propels this game into one of the greatest of all time. To say this game is something special is a ginormous understatement. If you’re a fan of puzzle games and you still somehow don’t have this game, you NEED to play it. Valve has done a phenomenal job with this installment, and I absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for puzzle games. This is one game that you absolutely need to have in your steam library.
Redefining the act of ghost wanking, one portal at a time.

La franchise portal est très connu, c'est un pillier du jeu vidéos de puzzle et est surement le deuxième meilleur jeux de Valve derrière le grand Half-Life, mais même si il est numéro 2, il ne vole pas sa place dans le panthéon des meilleurs jeu à mon simple avis.

L'histoire et les décors sont minimaliste, il n'y a que très peu de personnage mais tout est bien fait dans portal (le 1 comme le 2), le level design est bien fait, les puzzle sont difficiles mais pas impossible pour autant, tu galère 5-10min max sur un puzzle et tu profite énormément de l'histoire. les personnage sont bien écrit et énormément appréciable avec GlaDos et ses piques très violente qu'elle lance h24, wheatley, ce con affectueux et son magnifique problème avec les oiseaux et cave johnson qui est juste une pépite et dont son évolution a travers les messages audio qu'il à laissé est incroyable.

Je vous recommande portal, c'est un très bon jeu, une très belle aventure et une expérience que je n'oublierais pas.

作为Valve不出三系列之一（咳咳，划掉），我想为它写一篇测评。这应该是我在steam购买的第一款游戏（六块钱hhh），Valve的恐怖氛围渲染的是真的不错，无论是背景音乐还是场景，都非常非常棒，而且官网出的漫画也非常有意思，讲述雪儿的身世什么的，（可以找来看看）然后创意工坊的谜题也是超级有趣，非常推荐！！！qwq

Klasyka, bardzo porządna fabuła pełna humoru. Tryb kooperacji jest warty czasu (jeśli tylko ma się z kim), tu (bardziej przez interakcje ze znajomym niż przez dialogi) również można się pośmiać.
Kampanie nie są przesadnie długie ale są komory społeczności oraz mody, które sobie świetnie z tym problemem radzą (natomiast warto sprawdzić listy fajnych komór w internecie, w warsztacie znalezienie czegoś fajnego zabiera trochę czasu).
Крутая игра!
每一次通过一个房间都有满满的成就感！作者真TM是天才！
传送门系列我觉得是那种，第一眼看过去不是你喜欢的那种类型的游戏，但是玩下去之后，你会被它的剧情和有意思的关卡所吸引。可惜，我周围的人没人吃我的安利。超喜欢这个系列，可惜，G胖不会数三。
头脑风暴，一触即发！益智类游戏中将一些奇思妙想充分实现的游戏！剧情包括一开始的悬念和随之而来跌宕起伏的事件，独一无二的游戏内行动方式，自制地图与双人合作的对游戏的延展性补充，让这款游戏成为了解谜游戏中的巅峰之作
Great to play in single player and the puzzles are amazing. Would highly recommend the co-op too because there are so many brilliant maps, both official and Steam Workshop.
This is that one game you never uninstall. When you have no other games to play or all other games let you down, there is always Portal 2 to go back to.

Oyunu çok eskiden almama rağmen yeni bitirdim. Çünkü saatlerce bulmaca çözdüğümüz boş bir oyun sanmıştım. Ama Valve bulmaca oyununu bile efsane bir hale getirmiş. En sevdiğim oyunlardan biri oldu. Çok oyunculu modunu da en kısa zamanda bitireceğim. İndirimde 3TL civarı bir fiyata düşüyor, bu fiyata daha iyi oyun bulamazsınız. Bu arada bu sefer gerçekten de pasta yalandı, ilk oyunda vanilyalı pastayı yemiştim afiyetle. Ama bu oyunda bir bardak su bile vermeden gönderdiler bizi. Yani umarım bu dediklerim Aperture Laboratories'ten bir yetkilinin kulağına gider de şu pasta işini hallederler.
J'ai adorer le 1 et de voir le 2 plus les mod fait par la communauté c'est juste incroyable, l'histoire, le gameplay etc... +1 bon achat ! yay ! Je recommande.
I loved this game.  I enjoy puzzle games, not a fan of violent shooter games, and Portal 2 was challenging and fun.  There was humor, and the voices were great.

Portal 2 es una delicia jugable y súper satisfactorio de completar, ideal para desenpolvar las neuronas con un poco de razonamiento lógico. Los controles y la jugabilidad van como piña y los puzzles van aumentando su complejidad a medida que avanzas pero sin llegar a ser un dolor de cabeza tan grande. El argumento del juego es super divertido e interesante y GLADOS vuelve a brillar con esa personalidad tan...GLADOS que la caracteriza, risas aseguradas y diversión por montones. A comprarlo.
Lo mejor: GLADOS y todos los apartados del juego

정말 재미있게 한 게임이였다.  하는동안 머리 아프게 퍼즐도 많이 나왔지만, 그만큼 할 가치가 있었고, 훌륭한 게임이였다. 내 첫 스팀 게임으로 결정한 것에 후회가 없었다. 이제 2회차도 해볼 생각이다.

Игра очень токсична.
Может потому, что вся вода в игре - это кислота. 
А может потому, что вам придется постоянно терпеть пассивную агрессию, со стороны некой дамы~картошки Гладос. 
Ведет себя отвратительно, мешает постоянно, что-то выливает на голову, сбрасывает в бассейны с химикатами, натравливает турели, играет с системами подачи воздуха и НП газа, позволяет себе отпускать довольно язвительные замечания и постоянно не дает НИЧЕГО стащить с собой из камеры!
Ближе к концу игры закрадывается подозрение, что она просто неуравновешенная и хочет вас убить. (но это не точно..она выдает все это за случайности)
П.С кооператив это шанс переплюнуть гладос в ее изуверствах, так что выбирать товарища придётся, как какого-нибудь покемона: один раз и на всю жизнь.
Best game ive ever played period. One of my faves with great voice actors and a fantastic story
Best game ever! With your girlfriend/friend or alone. Humorous & endless fun with the workshop as well!

For whatever reason I never really got around to playing this game until just now. I purchased the Orange Box when it came out mostly to play the original Portal. I loved that game. The puzzles and humour were unique and so entertaining. I suppose I just didn't think a sequel would be able to improve on it. I can happily say now, after having played Portal 2's complete single player compaign, that this game is better in every respect. The humour is spot on with an amazing cast of voice talent. The puzzles are more varied and creative. The music is better, the gameplay is longer. And I haven't even touched the co-op gameplay yet. If you haven't played this game yet you absolutely have to. And do yourself a favour and play the original first. Portal and Portal 2 are without a doubt must play games for everyone.

8/10 - It is a very well-made and complex puzzle co-op. However, it is difficult and not a couch co-op to be played with a non-gamer partner or friends. I plan to start playing again, this time in single-player mode.

Big improvement in content, took much more time to complete, almost four times more. I honestly love this game and how it replaces the need for skill with the need of book smarts. The one thing I did not like about this is that they removed the throwing mechanic, I had so much fun with it in the original Portal, and they had the decency to remove it.

This is a game for everyone.  A mix of puzzle solving, first person exploration, storytelling.  Wheatley will make you laugh out loud, he is seriously hilarious.  Looks great and will run on old computers.  Multiplayer is fantastic.  It is up there with Zelda, Halo, Uncharted with the greatest games of all time.  A must play.
